abstract: The treatment, denosumab, delayed the spread of prostate cancer to bones in a clinical trial, the company said late Monday.
snippet: The treatment, denosumab, delayed the spread of prostate cancer to bones in a clinical trial, the company said late Monday.
lead_paragraph: Amgen’s bone drug denosumab delayed the spread of prostate cancer to bones in a clinical trial, the company said late Monday. However, the drug did not prolong the lives of men.

headline.main: Amgen Drug Slows Spread of Cancer but Doesn’t Extend Life
headline.print_headline: Amgen Drug Slows Spread of Cancer but Doesn’t Improve Survival in Trial
